panels.description: Время подписания всех документов по отчёту. Измеряется в часах.
panels.title: PROCESSING to SUCCESS all documents

panels.description: Статусы полученные от platform-connector и отправленные в as-sp
panels.title: Edic request statuses

panels.description: Количество сохраненных запросов в EDI платформу
panels.title: Connection count

panels.description: Количество полученных неудачных событий запроса по типу.
panels.title: Received failed request events

targets.expr:
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service=~"edic-contract-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*" }[$__range])) / 
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service=~"edic-contract-manager.*", uri=~"/v1.*"}[$__range]))
sum by (status, uri, method) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", service=~"edic-contract-manager.*", status=~"3..|4..|5.."}[$__rate_interval])) >= 0

panels.description: Время ответа contract-manager при вызове из report-manager

targets.expr:
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service=~"edic-report-manager.*", uri=~"/v1/contracts.*" }[$__range])) / 
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service=~"edic-report-manager.*", uri=~"/v1/contracts.*"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Report-manager to Сontract-manager api response

panels.description: Время ошибочного ответа contract-manager при вызове из report-manager

targets.expr: sum by (status, uri, method) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", service=~"edic-report-manager.*",  uri=~"/v1/contracts.*", status=~"3..|4..|5..|CLIENT_ERROR|SERVER_ERROR"}[$__rate_interval])) >= 0

panels.title: Report-manager to Сontract-manager api errors

panels.description: Время ответа Edi платформы при вызове из platform-connector

targets.expr:
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service=~"edic-platform-connector.*", uri=~"/partners/edi-exchange-platform/v2/requests.*" }[$__range])) / 
sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service=~"edic-platform-connector.*", uri=~"/partners/edi-exchange-platform/v2/requests.*"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Platform-connector to Edi api response

panels.description: Время ошибочного ответа Edi платформы при вызове из platform-connector

targets.expr: sum by (status, uri, method) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{ namespace="$namespace", service=~"edic-platform-connector.*", uri=~"/partners/edi-exchange-platform/v2/requests.*", status=~"3..|4..|5..|CLIENT_ERROR|SERVER_ERROR"}[$__rate_interval])) >= 0

panels.title: Platform-connector to Edi api errors
